00090 void AnalyzerWindow::Plot(PhotonMap* map, TShape* shape, unsigned int u, unsigned int v)
00091 {
00092 
00093         m_plot = new SurfacePlot(this);
00094 
00095     Flux flux(*m_plot, map, shape);
00096 
00097     flux.setMesh(u,v);
00098     flux.setDomain(0,100,0,100);
00099     flux.setMinZ(0);
00100         
00101     flux.create();
00102         
00103 
00104         
00105     for (unsigned i=0; i!=m_plot->coordinates()->axes.size(); ++i)
